page.title: 09LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content:
{All figures relate to 250 households {surveyed.
The most popular hobby is knitting and hobbies range from English folk_dancing and pop_mobility to decorating and sport. Every family has a television. 76% of people watch television for less than 20 hours per week. The most popular radio stations are Radio Merseyside and Radio City. A slight majority of people use local leisure facilities. The most used local leisure facility is the Oval Sports Centre. 55% of people think that local leisure facilities are not adequate.
